boardgame.description: Shadow Hunters is a survival board game set in a devil-filled forest in which three groups of characters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;the Shadows, creatures of the night; the Hunters, humans who try to destroy supernatural creatures; and the Neutrals, civilians caught in the middle of this ancient battle_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;struggle against each other to survive._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You belong to one of these groups and must conceal your identity from others since you don't know whom you can trust_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;at least not initially. Over time, though, someone might decipher who you are through your actions or through Hermit cards, or you might even reveal yourself to use your special ability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The key to victory is to identify your allies and enemies early because once your identity is revealed, your enemies will attack with impunity using their special abilities like Demolish, Teleport, and Suck Blood or their equipment cards such as the Rusty Broad Ax or Fortune Brooch. This ancient battle comes to a head and only one group will stand victorious_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;or a civilian, in the right circumstances, might claim victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The 2011 edition of Shadow Hunters from Z-Man Games includes the Shadow Hunters Expansion, a set of ten new characters previously sold separately._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Z-Man Games.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7030) Designed by Yasutaka Ikeda Identify! You are a Shadow, a creature of the night, or a Hunter, a human whose job is to destroy supernatural creatures, or a civilian, a normal human just caught in the middle of this ancient battle. But your identity remains secret until someone outs you through your actions and through Hermit cards or you reveal yourself to use your special ability. The key to victory is to identify your allies and enemies early. Survival! Once your identity is revealed, your enemies will attack without impunity using their special abilities like Demolish, Teleport, and Suck Blood or equipment cards such as the Rusty Broad Ax or Fortune Brooch. This ancient battle comes to a head and only one group will stand victorious – or a civilian, in the right circumstances, might claim victory. Good game for a large group of players. Contents: 1 board, 16 wood cylinders, 74 cards (10 character, 6 area, 16 Hermit, 16 black, and 16 white cards), 8 player cards, 2 dice (1x6 sided and 1x4 sided), rules No. of players: 4-8 Ages: 10+ Playing time: 45-60 minutes

Zman Games - Shadow Hunters Language: English Players: 2-8 Age: 10+ Duration: about 60 min Weight: 0.820 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: This game could be called Werewolf the board game. Each player has a secret identity - either a member of the Shadow, Hunter or Neutral faction. Each has a win condition and a special ability (and you need to be revealed to use your special ability). The object is to suss out your enemies and find your allies. You do this by visiting different locations which give the ability to draw cards to help in determining the identity of the other players. Good for a large group of players. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7030) Identify! You are a Shadow, a creature of the night, or a Hunter, a human whose job is to destroy supernatural creatures, or a civilian, a normal human just caught in the middle of this ancient battle. But your identity remains secret until someone outs you through your actions and through Hermit cards or you reveal yourself to use your special ability. The key to victory is to identify your allies and enemies early. Survival! Once your identity is revealed, your enemies will attack without impunity using their special abilities like Demolish, Teleport, and Suck Blood or equipment cards such as the Rusty Broad Ax or Fortune Brooch. This ancient battle comes to a head and only one group will stand victorious - or a civilian, in the right circumstances, might claim victory. Good game for a large group of players.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7030) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Shadow Hunters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; is a survival board game where three groups of characters, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Shadow (Monster like a Vampire)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Hunter (exorcists)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Neutral (ordinary human)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; struggle against each other to survive. The story takes place in a forest of devildom.You assume one of the three groups of characters concealing your identity from others_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; judgment. Identify! You are a Shadow, a creature of the night, or a Hunter, a human whose job is to destroy supernatural creatures, or a civilian, a normal human just caught in the middle of this ancient battle. But your identity remains secret until someone outs you through your actions and through Hermit cards or you reveal yourself to use your special ability. The key to victory is to identify your allies and enemies early. Survival! Once your identity is revealed, your enemies will attack without impunity using their special abilities like Demolish, Teleport, and Suck Blood or equipment cards such as the Rusty Broad Ax or Fortune Brooch. This ancient battle comes to a head and only one group will stand victorious - or a civilian, in the right circumstances, might claim victory. Shadow Hunters is a good game for a large group of players. (via Z-Man games)

*** 4th Dimension Games *** Shadow Hunters: $18.50 In Stock (7% sales tax for residents of Pennsylvania) This is a New, Sealed in Shadow Hunters board game. Publisher: Z-Man Games [ZMG7030] Number of Players: 4-8 Length: 30 minutes Shipping: Shipping rates will be determined upon sale or request. Insurance is optional but highly recommended for higher priced items. The shipping costs are NOT inflated. You pay exactly what I am charged for shipping, along with material costs. I ship through FedEx or USPS, whichever is cheaper. Normal shipping costs run from $8.00 - $11.00. If you have a commercial address that I can send to, your shipping costs will be even less! Payment: I accept PayPal, money orders, personal and cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks. Personal checks will be accepted but I will wait until the check has cleared before sending the item. I will add 3.9% to the price when paying by PayPal. Return Policy: I want you to be completely satisfied with your item. Because of this, I will accept return of any item for a refund of the purchase price within 30 days of the sale. The item must be in the same condition that it was sent. I cannot refund the shipping cost.

The game: Z-Man version (c) 2008. All game parts are unplayed and still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7030) Identify: In Shadow Hunters, each player has a secret character identity - Shadow, Hunter or Neutral (civilian). Figure out the identities of the other players to determine who is your ally and who is your ennemy! Survive: Once your identity is revealed, your ennemies will attack you using their special abilities such as Demolish, Teleport, Suck Blood with the help of equipments like Rusted Broad Axe or Cursed Sword Masamune. A fierce survival battle between the Shadows and the Hunters will ignite where only the strongest can win. Unless, a civilian in the right circumstances, claims victory! THIS EDITION INCLUDES more Hunters, more Shadows, and more Civilians are included to add variety to your Shadow Hunters games. Some characters include: Bryan with his MYGOD!!! special ability; Fu-Ka and her Dynamite Nurse ability, and Ultra Soul with his Murder Ray ability. With this many more characters, you will leave players guessing as to who you really are!
AUCTION ITEM FOR neo_jman

Payment by PayPal in advance or cash on pickup. For PayPal, the account MUST be a registered US address and MUST match the buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s BGG Marketplace address. For shipping this is considered a medium size game. The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.95 (small), $13.10 (medium), or $17.90 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.
